resources.string: Welcome to Screenplay!\n\nThis is the initial Scene. Press the home button to navigate the other sample Scenes.
This Scene uses a PageRigger. When entering the scene, the PageRigger adds the new Scene to the layout. After the transition completes, the previous scene is removed from the layout.
The StackRigger adds a new scene above the previous screen, but does not remove the previous screen.This makes it ideal for partial screen containers.
Dialogs in Screenplay are just Views, and are 100%% configurable. This one has a wrap_content height.
You can pass a callback to a Scene and fire the callback when the view is detached.
